column1: Pre Primary Teacher
column2: Role & responsibilities   Ensuring that the health and safety of children is given utmost priority along with supporting physical needs ofchildren which may include working in partnership with parents with regards to toilet training, intake of meals, personalhygiene, sleep routines as well as fostering positive behaviour. Ensuring that a routine is created and followed for the children so as to cater to their physical, emotional andnutritional needs. Developing, planning, executing, and organizing lesson plans to meet the needs of the children as per the agegroups. Ensuring age-appropriate learning and socialization to ensure children learn basic skills and concepts, such ascommunication, manners, sharing, etc. Maintaining a safe workplace by monitoring children for health, behavioral, and emotional issues and reporting concerns to Centre Head, staff and parents. Observing children and helping them discover new interests by introducing them to art, music, sports, and other potential hobbies. Ensuring children are learning positive behaviors and providing guidance as needed. Preparing all necessary materials for each lesson in advance and submitting the lesson plans and weekly timetables two weeks prior to the commencement of those classes, to the Centre Head. Responsible for conducting oneself in a way that will not tarnish the reputation of the school in any manner. Updating parents about the childs daily activities of sleep, meals and activities via the Parent App to the Preferred candidate profile   Should be able to handle children from 0 years to 6 years. Atleast 1years exp into Pre Primary Age below 40 years Should be able to work for full time Perks and benefits   PF/ESI/Medical Benifit Attendance Bonus other allowances

column1: SUBSTITUTE TEACHER
column2: We are searching for a resourceful Substitute Teacher to join our high calibre team at FIS THANE. Growing your career as a Full Time Substitute Teacher is a terrific opportunity to develop competitive skills.        Teacher Effectiveness      :    Teaching & Learning      The teacher should :        Contribute to the development of curriculum and production of units/schemes of work.          Become familiar with the curriculum guidelines, and work towards their successful implementation Demonstrate an understanding of inquiry and give students choices to show their understanding.          Decide and explain clear learning objectives and set appropriate assignments with an adequate time allocation.          Present material in a clear, organized fashion.          Stimulate interest in the subject matter.          Set work at the appropriate level and encourage high student performance, consistent with ability.          Use a variety of methods and available teaching aids, aiming to meet the needs of the individual and the group.          Encourage creative and critical thinking and expression of ideas.          Provide feedback that is designed to motivate the students.          Evaluate and record student progress.          Contact parents through written reports and other formal and informal means, as required.          Plan activities to broaden the experience of the learner, as appropriate.          Plan Units of Inquiry and lessons by following the curriculum framework collaboratively with the Mentors & Specialist teachers          Write and implement learning objectives that are challenging and measurable.          Monitor, assess and report on learners work and progress.          Demonstrate and pursue excellence in teaching and best practices in education General Classroom Management        The teacher should:        Use classroom and behavioural management strategies that are positive, structured, consistent, respectful, and responsive to student needs, to build a safe, orderly, inclusive, and positive classroom community.          Utilize an effective approach to behaviour management, time management, classroom organization and appearance, planning, teaching, learning and reporting.          Establish clear guidelines and expectations for students.          Ensure that effective classroom routines are established and followed.          Encourage students to develop good work habits, neatness and careful use of materials, books, and ICT.          Assist students in developing self-discipline and independence.          Encourage respect among students and between teacher and students.          Show consistency and fairness in dealing with students.          Create a psychologically safe learning environment that is conducive to risk taking.          Encourage students to interact and work cooperatively with others and engage all students in activities.          Work with colleagues in a co-operative spirit.          Give and accept constructive suggestions for improvements.          Refrain from public criticism of the school or colleagues and communicate any concerns through the appropriate channels.          Show tact and discretion in dealing with school matters and remain calm and objective if difficult situations arise.          Respect & maintain confidentiality of school policies/ documents.          Be punctual in meeting all time obligations and deadlines, with regards to all aspects of the role, including the production of reports, arrival at school and lessons, classroom supervision, duties, meetings etc.          Respect all deadlines set out by the Principal, maintaining appropriate documentation.

column1: Walk-in Opportunity For Experienced Preschool Teacher_(Female ONLY)
column2: Are you a SUPER MOM living in Bangalore, who misses going to work?? Are you someone who loves managing classroom and teaching pre-primary kids? Are you a good team lead and with excellent interpersonal skills? Were you in the middle management team, but took a career break and now willing to get back to work? Do you like a JOB that enriches you with multi-functional career development? If yes, we are waiting for you!! You are looking at the right career opportunity!!! Contact HR ANWESHA(8917404562 or anwesha.m@klay.co.in) Job Title: Early years expert facilitator (ONLY FEMALE) Location   All over Bangalore  Experience: Minimum 2-3 years of early years teaching experience (Montessori, Kindergarten, Preschool, Early childhood) working Hours: 7 hours-( 9AM-4PM) Alt 2 Saturday in a month- (9AM-1PM) Education: Degree in Early Childhood Education (NTT, Montessori, ECE, CIDTT trained) or Bachelor's Degree Job Type: Full Time   We seek educators who:   Possess excellent English language skills verbal and written. Should speak grammatically correct language with proper diction, pronunciation and no MTI. Are excellent communicators Are adaptive Have ownership Embrace diversity and inclusion Are community builders Key Responsibility and Accountability:   Curriculum Delivery Team work Health & Safety Parent Connect Professional & Personal Development Classroom Code of Conduct ' Qualifications and experience required:   Demonstrated knowledge of current best practices in pedagogy and innovation. Successful teaching experience. Recent training and/or experience in the current curriculum. Experience as a Teacher in early years education. Excellent written and verbal communication skills (English language proficiency) Ability to communicate effectively with students, parents, teachers and others. Relevant university credentials in an academic field. Secondary license or certification for teaching the subject would be an added plus. Work experience with other cultures and nationalities. Ability to differentiate instruction for all learners. Ability to participate in and establish collaborative structures. Proven ability to develop successful academic programs. Willingness to moderate assignments at all levels to ensure collective understanding of achievement. Willingness to reinforce mission and core values of the organisation. Ability to use learning data to explore and improve teaching and learning practices. Ability to engage students in learning activities using a variety of current technologies and online platforms. Additional Skills   Basic Computer skills including MS Office suite of MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint   Role:   Preschool & Primary Education - Other Industry Type:   Education / Training Department:   Teaching & Training Employment Type:   Full Time, Permanent Role Category:   Preschool & Primary Education

column1: Pre Primary Teacher
column2: Skills        child care      teaching      pre primary      Montessori      daycare      primary                      Job Overview                We are seeking a dedicated and passionate Pre Primary Teacher to join our team at InfoWryt Solutions LLP.      As a Pre Primary Teacher, you will be responsible for creating a nurturing and stimulating environment for young children to learn and grow. This is a full-time position based in Hyderabad, Telangana, India.                Qualifications and Skills                Bachelor's degree in Early Childhood Education or a related field      Junior: 1 to 3 years of experience in teaching pre-primary students      Passion for working with young children and fostering their growth and development      Excellent communication and interpersonal skills      Patience, empathy, and the ability to connect with and inspire young learners      Strong organizational and time-management skills      Knowledge of child development principles and best practices in early childhood education      Ability to create a positive and inclusive learning environment      Proficiency in using educational technology tools and resources                Roles and Responsibilities                Develop and implement age-appropriate lesson plans and curriculum for pre-primary students      Create a nurturing and supportive classroom environment that fosters the overall development of each child      Prepare and present engaging and interactive lessons that promote active learning      Provide individualized attention and support to each child based on their unique needs and abilities      Monitor and assess the progress of each child, and provide timely feedback to parents/guardians      Collaborate with parents/guardians to ensure the holistic development and well-being of each child      Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of each child's academic and social development      Ensure the safety and welfare of all students during school hours and activities      Participate in professional development opportunities to enhance teaching skills and stay updated with best practices in early childhood education

column1: Faculty (4th To 10th)
column2: Faculty About Us BYJUS is the world's most valuable Ed-tech company and the creator of Indias most loved School learning app which offers highly adaptive, engaging and effective learning programs For students in classes 1-12(K-12) and competitive exams like JEE, NEET, CAT and IAS. BYJU'S - The Learning App, the flagship product for classes 4-12 was launched in 2015. Today, the app has over 35 million registered students and 2.4millionannual paid subscriptions. With an average time of 71 minutes being spent by a student on the app everyday from1700+cities, the app is creating a whole new way of learning through visual lessons. It is encouraging students to become self-initiated learners. The Disney BYJU'S Early Learn App was launched in June 2019, a special Opening from BYJU'S in collaboration with Disney India for students in classes1-3.The apps have been designed to adapt to the Unique learning style of every student, as per the pace, size, and style of learning. BYJU'S is paving the way for new-age, geography agnostic learning tools that sit at the cross-section of mobile, interactive content and personalized learning methodologies. To know more about the company, please download the apps (Available in Play Store & App store) or visit us at  https://byjus.com/ Our products range from: Learning apps catering to students in India to computer vision and artificial intelligence enabled learning programs across the world( OSMO  - playosmo.com and Byjus.com). Tech enabled learning programs spread across North America, Europe and Australia ( Epic!  - getepic.com). Coding platforms where 50 million users solve puzzles, build games, stories and interactive animations by coding   Tynker   App . Teaching live one-on-one sessions with students across 7 countries Byjus Future School ( WhitehatJr ). In-demand skills to learn and Advance career in AI, ML, Data science, Digital marketing, Cloud, Software engineering ( Great   learning ) Indias top coaching for NEET, IIT-JEE, NTSE, KVPY Olympiad and other competitive exams ( Aakash ) www.byjus.com   Job   Title: Faculty   BYJUS   Home   Tuition We are one of the worlds leading education-media-technology companies and we are making millions fall in love with learning. We are coming up with the next generation of Home Tuitions in India. We are looking for enthusiastic and competent candidates who can think both, in and out of the box, to help students in a more interactive and tech-based environment and make them learn better at their homes. If you are passionate about introducing the ??hink and Learn??concept in more creative ways, here is the right place for you. It?? a great opportunity to work on an important mission and join a fun, talented team.   Job Role:  Faculty for BYJU?? Tuition Centre (Class 4 -10)  Subjects:  Biology/Chemistry/Physics and Mathematics. ( 4th to 10th class) Location:  PAN India Working days & Shift:   6 days/week Timing:  12-9 PM ( May vary as per BTC City ) Weekly Off : Monday Roles and Responsibilities: Teach students as per curriculum and schedule. Monitor student discipline and in-class activity. Discuss homework, resolve in-class doubts and monitor students??progress. Employment Type: Full Time Work from Office (Offline) Qualifications & Experience: B.E/B.Tech/M.Tech/B.Sc/M.Sc/BDS/B.Ed At Least 1+ of teaching experience in Science or Math for grades 4-10 Experience & Skills: Good communication & explanation skills Patient and resilient personality Dedication towards  students and their education Understanding of the National/State Curriculum Location:  At respective BTC Centers Language:  English & Local State Language

column1: School Shadow Teacher
column2: Blessed Angels is Hiring Part time & Full time Shadow Teacher's for Primary & Pre Primary Schools in Mumbai & Thane A shadow teacher is an educational assistant who works directly with a single special needs child during his Preschool & Primary School. A shadow teacher allows the child to attend a mainstream class while receiving the extra attention that he needs. Roles and Responsibilities of Shadow Teachers : Accompanying the Child Throughout The School Day To Provide Support And Stability Help The Child Understand And Display Appropriate Behaviour In The Classroom Supporting And Providing Guidance For Carrying Out Daily Academic Activities At School Provide Individual Support to the child throughout the School Hours. Help The Child Become Responsible Thus Fostering Independence And Encourage Learning. Working Hours & Salary ; Part Time ; 4 Hours - Rs.  10,000  per month. Full Time ; 7 Hours ; Rs.  13,000  per month. 5 days working. Fixed Saturday & Sunday Off. Job Location would be 30-40 minutes travelling from residence. Interested Candidates may Apply or WhatsApp  9152207710

column1: Preschool and Daycare Teacher @BLR (Locations Mentioned Below)
column2: Job description Contact HR Anwesha- 8917404562 or send updated resume at anwesha.m@klay.co.in Work location @ Bangalore_ Marathahalli, Bellandur, Kundanahalli, Whitefield, ITPL, KR Puram, Garudacharpalya, Hoodi Designation   - Head Facilitator / Expert Facilitator - Preschool and Daycare Teacher (Only females) Reporting to   Centre Director Qualifications   Degree in Early Childhood Education (NTT, Montessori, ECE, CIDTT trained) compulsory and Graduation Experience   Minimum 3 years of preschool teaching experience General Description   We are looking for Head Teachers who can provide fun and enriching learning environment which takes care of the cognitive, physical, personal, social and emotional developmental needs of the children placed under her care and also be a team player, acting as a role model for her team of teachers and staff by exemplifying the right / KLAY values and code of conduct while planning and executing sessions, events, trips, interacting with parents and vendors or any other centre related activities. Main   Responsibilities Maintains required reports and records for every child in the class Ensures that resources are utilized effectively and works towards minimizing wastage Play a key role in enhancing the appeal of the centre/class with age appropriate displays, learning resources and fun and enriching activities Is well versed with the school policies and ensures that the school policies are adhered to at all times Ensures that regular and relevant communication is sent out to parents Ensures that the class is fun and enriching for children by thinking out of the box while planning activities and sessions. Ensures that the lesson plans and activities are planned in advance Ensures that the lesson Plan (post approval from Curriculum team) is implemented and keep children constructively occupied during at all times throughout the day Ensures that observations and assessments of children are carried out regularly Ideating, planning, and executing events, trips, celebrations etc. along with colleagues, as per the Events Calendar Ensures the safety, health, hygiene and security of the child along with the other teaching and non-teaching staff. Guiding assistant teachers and support staff and giving them feedback as required Notifying centre head of any areas of concern Interacting with parents to discuss childs progress and other needs during PTCs and on need basis Additional Skills Knowledge of early child development milestones and child related concepts and practices Basic Computer skills including MS Office suite of MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint Good Communication & presentation skills, both oral and written, esp. report writing Being good in Creative work and Story-telling skills

column1: Centre Head-Sector 150 Noida- Little Millennium Pre-School & Daycare
column2: Are you a Dynamic and Experienced Woman Leader with a passion for Early Childhood Education? We are looking for a Centre Head at Sector 150 Noida to lead our team !     Responsibilities:     Securing Admissions and Handle enquiries. Manage all aspects of school administration. Ensure effective implementation of the curriculum. Handle parent interactions and maintain positive relationships. General management and daily operations of the centre.     Requirements:     Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Proven ability to multitask and manage time effectively. Self-motivated with a strong passion for education and Business Previous experience in a similar role is highly desirable. Managing day to day activities at the preschool Procure and arrange instructional resources for use in the classroom. Addressing parents concerns ensuring a positive relationship and genuine resolution Managing staff and ensuring policies and procedures are being implemented. Dealing with vendors for any infrastructure issue Hire, train, and evaluate teachers / Didis performance. Train, encourage, and mentor teachers and other staff. Supervise teachers and other support staff. Work actively with teachers to maintain high curriculum standards.     Additional Skills :     2+ years experience working with children in a classroom setting. Basic computer skills, including Internet, email, hand-held device skills, word processing, and spreadsheets. Complex Problem-Solving skills Judgment and Decision-Making skills Service Orientation Enterprising and high in initiative Stress Tolerance Leadership        Tremendous Growth opportunity for a self motivated and Result Oriented Candidate !     If you are a motivated and dedicated professional ready to make a difference, we want to hear from you !     Apply now and be a part of our vibrant community !   Send Resume to : Shephali.kasliwal@littlemillennium.com mahima.mathur@littlemillennium.com

column1: Pre-School Teacher - Females Only
column2: *******  This opportunity is only for female candidate ******* ******* We are not an agent or any consultancy. We have nursery (Preschool) operating in London * ******  Please find our Nursery address and website link below: Rise 'N' Shine Nursery 34-35 Skylines Village, Limeharbour London, E14 9TS  United Kingdom Website Link: https://www.risenshinenursery.co.uk/#/ Social Media Platform: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/risenshinenursery/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/risenshinenursery/ * ******  * ******  * ******  * ******  * ******  * ***** * ******  * ******  * ******  * ******  * ******  * ******  We are looking for enthusiastic, empathetic, caring and responsible candidates to join our  renowned Educational institution, Rise 'N' Shine Nursery, in UK London .  With a desire to support children (0-5 years old) in the early years of their life the candidate will be responsible for implementing an effective teaching and learning experience in the classroom.  The successful candidate should be willing to work in a child care center. Moreover, we are seeking candidates who possess strong communication skills which is a mandatory requirement.  School Type: Day Nursery/ Day Care / Preschool / Private Nursery School About Us: Welcome to Rise N Shine Nursery! We are a part of a growing number of nurseries that strive to offer a life-changing education to children ranging from 0-5 years, across London. We have been serving childcare in the UK (London) for the last  5 years.  Rise N Shine is a  multicultural Nursery School and ChildCare Centre  who work as a team and always share knowledge and resources that help to simplify work processes and effectively manage workload for better work-life balance. With children all across the world, we believe in rewarding our staff with good career opportunities, better pay and multiple benefits. Visit our school website:  https://www.risenshinenursery.co.uk/ Social Media Platform: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/risenshinenursery/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/risenshinenursery/ WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING:  . Planning and developing rich learning opportunities, providing exceptional care, and introducing materials to students. Timely assessing childrens progress and making an accurate and effective assessment that would reflect their interests and needs. Engaging children with interactive activities and materials. Developing and maintaining a strong parent-carer partnership, which includes regularly communicating with parents and administrators. Maintaining an organized classroom. Closely working with colleagues to maintain a healthy, happy, and positive environment on a regular basis. To foster a positive learning environment. To stay up-to-date with the changes in the curriculum. REQUIREMENTS: Mandatory Bachelors Degree (B.Ed.) and a Masters Degree (M.Ed.). A sound understanding of the Early Years Foundation Stage (If not, then training will be provided) Should have the necessary knowledge and experience working with young children with Special Educational Needs. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Should be well organized and resilient and possess an attitude and a sense of fun. Should be knowledgeable of the curriculum standards for the subject area to be taught. Should possess a teaching certificate. WHAT WE CAN OFFER YOU: Our benefits include, but are not limited to: Sponsored Visa Accommodation could be on a shared basis. Accommodation can be pre arranged from the candidate side or can be arranged from our side as well.  Up to 28 days annual leave - 20 days holiday, 8 bank holidays, and up to 5 further days with years of service (depending on position) Staff childcare discount  scheme for parental staff. Access to a wide selection of  training programmes , supporting your individual career path, with career development opportunities. Company Pension Excellent professional development opportunities.
